```{r, fig.height = 5, fig.width=10, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
require(foieGras)
require(ggplot2)

fit.mp <- fit_ssm(sese, 
                  model = "mp", 
                  time.step = 24, 
                  control = ssm_control(verbose = 0))

aes <- aes_lst(conf = FALSE, 
               mp_pal = hcl.colors(n=100, "RdBu"))
aes$df$size[1] <- 1.5
aes$df$fill[6] <- grey(0.85)

map(fit.mp, 
    what = "p", 
    normalise = TRUE, 
    aes = aes,
    crs = "+proj=stere +lon_0=68 +datum=WGS84 +units=km") +
  theme(panel.grid = element_line(size=0.1, colour="grey60")) +
  labs(title = expression("Time-varying move persistence, "~gamma[t]))
```
